title: Corn â€” Cercospora / Gray leaf spot
description: Fungal leaf spots that reduce photosynthetic area and yield; use resistant varieties, crop rotation, and fungicides when necessary.

treatment.chemical: Apply azoxystrobin or pyraclostrobin fungicides starting at V6 stage and repeat as needed.
treatment.organic: Use crop rotation, resistant varieties, and copper-based sprays if available.
